document_name_accent: viem bao hoat dich khop co chan.json
subsection_content:
Although ankle bursitis can still heal on its own, many cases still require medical care and intervention. Subjective failure to treat early can easily make the condition worse, thereby leading to a number of serious complications such as:
The inflamed area becomes permanently thick and enlarged; The expansion of the inflammatory area causes surrounding structures to be seriously compressed, causing pain every time you move; The pain limits the mobility of the ankle, and in the long term there is a risk of atrophy of the surrounding muscles.; Ankle bursitis occurs more often in women than in men due to the habit of using high heels for a long time.
subsection_title: viem bao hoat dich khop co chan.json. Symptoms
subsection_data:
viem bao hoat dich khop co chan.json. Symptoms
Although ankle bursitis can still heal on its own, many cases still require medical care and intervention. Subjective failure to treat early can easily make the condition worse, thereby leading to a number of serious complications such as:
The inflamed area becomes permanently thick and enlarged; The expansion of the inflammatory area causes surrounding structures to be seriously compressed, causing pain every time you move; The pain limits the mobility of the ankle, and in the long term there is a risk of atrophy of the surrounding muscles.; Ankle bursitis occurs more often in women than in men due to the habit of using high heels for a long time.
